snippet: Officials hope to determine within weeks the number of American troops that will remain for the long term after the bulk of forces come home in 2014, Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta said.
abstract: Defense Secretary Leon E Panetta says that White House and Pentagon officials hope to determine within weeks number of American troops that will remain for long term in Afghanistan after bulk of forces return home in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Officials hope to determine within weeks the number of American troops that will remain for the long term after the bulk of forces come home in 2014, Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta said.
